website_summaries.verdict: A traditional-looking floating desk with a surprising amount of hidden practical features. Great to hide the fact you have a floating desk in the first place.
pros: Plenty of desk space provided by the folding table surface
Keep things hidden and out of the way when folded up and not in use
cons: Floating desk is heavy to initially mount and assemble

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little wall desk...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little wall desk, easy to mount on wall using the 3 screws that we drilled into the wall studs. Sturdy and handy for small work areas. With the depth only 6 inches and the small pull-out draw only 4 inches (see pictures) there are limits to what you can keep inside but nonetheless this is the perfect solution for those who need a writing desk but are limited on space. Love it! NOTE: when lifting up the drop-down desk to close, don’t forget to secure the latch to avoid potential hazard of falling open unexpectedly.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Product well above expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made and sturdy product. The only thing I had to do to it was cut a hole through thr bottom for charger cables. It shipped several days earlier than estimated and my wife absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Materials failed quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. After opening and closing only a handful of times the screws holding the door on at the hinges pulled out from the wood. Very disappointed. Seller does not stand by product and refused return.
customer_reviews.author: emily etherington

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little desk, great value!
customer_reviews.text: This desk is perfect for my tiny San Francisco apartment. I mounted it at a standing height as it looked better proportioned at that height on the wall. I believe it would also work with a high stool, which I'm on the watch for now. Best of all, Southern Enterprises has absolutely wonderful customer service! I called with a question and they helped me right away.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great high quality wall desk for my laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great high quality wall desk for my laptop. Nice drawer on the bottom holds all the bills to pay online. 15” laptop easily stores inside. I added a padded saddle stool.
customer_reviews.author: Schudson

customer_reviews.title: Looks as shown some disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: The structure of the Desk is what was expected. However the back cover and screws/anchors (3) are left wanting. The one screw for the middle bottom ended up going right through the paper board back even though I screwed in by hand. They are also spaced so that only 1 stud can be used with existing holes. I ended up purchasing stronger anchors and reinforcing where I put the screws in so that I had 2 in studs.
customer_reviews.author: RogerB.

customer_reviews.title: Get better hardware!
customer_reviews.text: Finally got both installed. They seem very sturdy. Those who mentioned the terrible hardware are CORRECT! Don't even bother using them, get better anchors or you'll get halfway through like I did and have to go buy more. Time will tell on the sturdiness. Spacing of the mounts only allows for one stud to be used. I mounted it higher as some others mentioned and ordered two 30" barstools for each kid's room. Minus one star for useless hardware.
customer_reviews.author: The Man

customer_reviews.title: although cool in appearance
customer_reviews.text: This item, although cool in appearance, did not last one week before the top broke from the hinges. My 11 year old was devastated when she sat down to do her homework and ended up with part of her desk in her lap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Far exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This desk far exceeded my expectations! It’s absolutely beautiful - the wood gleams! It’s very sturdy and heavy, and clearly high quality. I use it as an art desk and the compartments and drawer are perfect for storage. On top of everything, it’s one of the cheapest options for a wall desk! Really I cannot recommend this highly enough!
customer_reviews.author: L. Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent
customer_reviews.text: Cool Little Desk Easy to Hang - In my master bedroom my place is tiny , small drawer great for keys/phone/ wallet /HRM ETC - Slot inside hold one of my 3 Laptop/Tablets 15" with out issues ,work surface sufficient for doing what most non executives would do and would also suit an organized very small business owner - Minimal assembly hangs easy can drill through back if studs don't line up etc.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd T. Turbo

customer_reviews.title: A big disappointment, but it looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It is too small to really get it into the standard wall stud spacing, which is kinda frustrating. Also, the front panel was put together on the wrong side by the manufacturer, so that the hole where the knob should be is on the inside. We usually leave it open, but it's still an annoyance when we do have to close it.
customer_reviews.author: Annie H

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking and works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure that this is mostly laminated or MDF wood, but I certainly cannot tell from looking at it. The grains are both natural and deep. The latches are stylish. It seems to work very well. Some have complained about swelling when wet, and I guess that might occur if you get it wet, but I put a coaster in the cubby hole and use it when necessary. Pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Space Saving Desk
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this desk... Perfect to keep calendar, bills, mail, and keys organized and out of the way. When company comes over, we can close it up and hide the mess instead of having a crap pile on the kitchen counter. The only thing I don't like about it is that the mounting holes are about 21" apart which means your only hitting one stud.. very sturdy and functional.
customer_reviews.author: nicole rowe

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice. Nice grain
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice. Nice grain. Had to customize the installation however due to the placement of the mounting holes. But that's not an issue specific to this item. Lots of wall-mounted pieces come with wall anchors and pre-drilled holes that are for example 14" apart. Studs are at least 16" and I don't trust / like using wall anchors. Just doesn't make sense to me. But I'm just a carpenter so what do I know?
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!! The screws holding the folding desk part ...
customer_reviews.text: JUNK!! The screws holding the folding desk part literally popped out while pressing keys on my laptop. So I'm stuck with this piece of junk attached to my wall. Save yourself and DO NOT PURCHASE THIS DESK.
customer_reviews.author: Fay Ulanoff

customer_reviews.title: Great desk! Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an Indian-made Pottery Barn Teen desk (that cost $100 more and broke twice) with the stained version of this. So much better! Super-sturdy and the finish is furnature-quality. It's strange that the white version is $40 more, you'd think it would be the other way around. We bought the brown version and would recommend it without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: dman jack

customer_reviews.title: Great wall desk.  Update 3/13/2019
customer_reviews.text: Like it so far making into a mini work station in the bedroom. Updated 3/13/2019 - Product backing that attaches to the wall is now coming apart from the wall. Item can no longer stay up on the wall safely had to remove it. Product was nice for the couple of weeks it lasted but I would return if able.
customer_reviews.author: amssalomone

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of them to make a schooling space for my children’s remote learning days. I love the antique look design and color. It seems good quality. I and my children are very happy with the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Jun

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t last a week.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this little desk as it fit our tiny space perfectly. Unfortunately, within a few days, the screws began to pull out from the compressed wood both at the hinge and the side bracket. This is not well made at all.
customer_reviews.author: C. Licata

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little unit. Color brown red not too dark kind of light mahogany. Exactly as described. Had to drill a few holes in back to accommodate wire for computer and touch lamp. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Carah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my small sleeping closet
customer_reviews.text: Needed something for a small sleeping closet in my boat room. This is the perfect size, looks great and functions amazing for a small writing desk or laptop stand.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bo Stahl

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect in wall desk answer!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for what we wanted it for. To hold a laptop and have reps sign in for access to our center! Beautiful wood and sleek design!
customer_reviews.author: JoeRod

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk but mounting hardware is not the best
customer_reviews.text: The construction and finish of this cabinet are excellent. My only complaint is that the hardware they include to mount it to the wall is not sufficient to hold it securely in place. At least not on sheet rock. I remounted it with purchased fasteners and it sits in place nicely.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for small room
customer_reviews.text: This desk is a great find. It came completely assembled and ready for install. The only issue is that the screws that were supplied were on the short side but I just used longer screws and worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: kcntkc

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece!
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with this desk. It looks beautiful and also very sturdy and super functional. This is the best item I ever purchased on Amazon. Looks way more expensive than it is. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kary

customer_reviews.title: Love this space saver!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love this desk. It’s out of the way, but also was big enough that my laptop and tablet could live inside it. My one complaint is that there are no holes for cords to poke through, so I Had to drill a cord hole myself. Not difficult, but shouldn’t have needed to be done.
customer_reviews.author: Misti Edwards

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful Secret Desk.
customer_reviews.text: This little fold away desk is perfect for small spaces. It's well made and looks great. There was a small chip at the bottom drawer but I did not want to pack this back up to exchange it. My contractor was already at my home and ready to install it on my wall.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymus

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I brought my desk because I did not have space for an actual study table in my room. This thing is GREAT! I think my absolute best investment yet! And it was for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Functional, Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: A nicely constructed desk that we had no trouble installing. It is a perfect option for our tiny home, and we are quite pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Well built, easy to put up. Nothing wrong at all with this product. It even came sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: but to my happy surprise, It came assembled
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I expected that I’d have to assemble the desk, but to my happy surprise, It came assembled. The desk was easy to place on the wall, and it looks great! I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Amaya

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Nice and solid
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Nice and solid. Came fully assembled, I only hand to out the handles on the door and drawer. My only issue is the predrilled holes don’t match up with the studs in my wall. It comes with anchors but they’re cheap and I don’t believe they’ll hold much. It’s an easy fix though.
customer_reviews.author: moroangel

customer_reviews.title: Unit is nice and solid
customer_reviews.text: Unit is nice and solid. The only assembly required is to attach the knobs for the fold-down shelf and the drawer. Finish is nice and even and is a slightly darker, richer brown than the pictures here indicate. The unit came well-packaged and was very well protected in the box. My wife is very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: D in Oh

customer_reviews.title: Nice little nook desk.
customer_reviews.text: So far it's held up to the use. No issues with durability like others experienced. I did buy better fasteners for it from home depot.
customer_reviews.author: Aldo B

customer_reviews.title: Good product nice craftmanship
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product super easy to install the only reasons i give this 4 instead of 5 stara ia because i had to use bigger screws then the tiny ones it came with also there is a slight warp on the back board leaving the tiniest of gaps between the desk and wall. But all around great product highly recomed
customer_reviews.author: jeffery farra

customer_reviews.title: Gross - smells awful
customer_reviews.text: This has a terrible smell that will never go away
customer_reviews.author: meandmyty

customer_reviews.title: Compact Workspace - Works Great
customer_reviews.text: What a great laptop work space for a small area. Use this in an Airbnb room instead of trying to fit a desk for guests to have a laptop space.
customer_reviews.author: WAR

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Materials
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made in the People s Republic, Hinge screws were stripped out when it was received and bigger screw had to be substituted..Drop down hinge is pretty light duty and don't expect it to last very long. Made of mdf with a nice veneer.
customer_reviews.author: Andy P Ronan

customer_reviews.title: Great for limited space
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by sturdiness. Easy to install, working great for our granddaughter when she visits.
customer_reviews.author: GFenster

customer_reviews.title: A True Gem!!
customer_reviews.text: If your husband has turned your 2nd bathroom into his "private" office, this desk fits perfectly behind the door!! Yea!! His laptop and paperwork and all his stuff fits into this beautiful desk!! No mess and no fuss 😊
customer_reviews.author: decs7jim3

customer_reviews.title: Really love this wall desk even though it came with no ...
customer_reviews.text: Really love this wall desk even though it came with no hardware or knobs. Instructions say there should have been but other reviews recommended using different hardware anyway so that's what I did. I will also have to purchase knobs which I'm not too happy about but hey what are you gonna do?! Overall satisfied with the item itself since there was no assembly needed. To mount I used a stud finder, electric drill and 3" screws
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Perfect for a small bedroom desk! Easy to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sells

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but..The latch to hold it shut has already fallen off and part of the desk itself was damaged upon the desk being opened for use(the screws holding the hinge in place on one side pulled the hinge off along with a part of the desk).
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Good expect for flimsy pieces
customer_reviews.text: The lock broke seamlessly. The drawer knob is loose and there's no way to tighten it. Other than that it's exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: colorific gal

customer_reviews.title: Good standing desk
customer_reviews.text: Better looking than expected. It would have been useful to have a template for the mounting screws. I use it as a standing desk. Make sure it is well bolted or it will (and has) come down. The would is a little soft but acceptable for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I needed. This product is fully functional, occupies very little space and is absolutely strong for the use it was designed for. I was surprised and thank you very much to come armed.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item but it seemed great 😁. Just didn't have the space I thought I'd have.
customer_reviews.author: D. P. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i was looking for in my son’s small rooms
customer_reviews.author: KRISTEN

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, larger than it looks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these. They look very nice. They are pretty large and stand out of the wall about six inches. The drawer on the bottom is more of a box in a bigger box and doesn't slide out very well. They are not solid wood, they are veneered pressboard, so my attempts to drill them and put in locks were disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Watson

customer_reviews.title: not sturdy enough to hold your laptop for work
customer_reviews.text: the "desk" won't really support the weight of you typing on the laptop (aka laptop + weight of your arms). It just broke when i am workiing on my laptop and almost killed my laptop! Good appearance though.
customer_reviews.author: Z W Li

customer_reviews.title: Interesting design
customer_reviews.text: Saves floor room. My son likes it because of the extra space and it’s unique He play tricks on his friend when they ask what it is
customer_reviews.author: stacie

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This product's quality overall is outstanding. Straight out of the box there were no scratches or marks and the delivery came a whole week early. It also comes with everything you need just short of a drill. The only thing i suggest is if you live in older houses you're going to want to buy some longer screws and smaller wall anchors or just fasten it in two points to studs and leave the wall anchors. In the older houses like my mine have thicker less processed sheet rock so the anchors provided just tear up the wall and the screws are a little short to make it to the stud.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck RIley

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice space saving wall desk. The wood veneer looks great, and construction quality is good. I agree with other reviews that a mounting template would have been nice, and the mounting screws that are included are not adequate. No big deal though-- I made my own template and used proper wall anchors.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Hinges pulled out soon after buying
customer_reviews.text: The hinges aren't secured very well, they broke soon after I got it from normal use. I now use it as a cabinet instead.
customer_reviews.author: Deena

customer_reviews.title: Really loved this when we got it
customer_reviews.text: Really loved this when we got it. Took two of us to install it and it was exactly what we wanted for a bedroom desk area. Unfortunately after 6 weeks of use the drop down desk area holding my husbands laptop gave way and it crashed to the floor. Luckily the laptop survived the fall. If you purchase this, be cautious of how much weight you put on it.
customer_reviews.author: Gobnait 7119

customer_reviews.title: decent quality. sturdy
customer_reviews.text: for the cost, it's sturdy and looks good. I added some holes a little bigger but you can't see them. looks good
customer_reviews.author: Bob love

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Space
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for any space I've lived it, a fantastic desk. Only problem is the screw plates for the hinges immediately broke and the knobs have fallen off, nothing a little super glue can't fix. I Iove my desk
customer_reviews.author: Richard B. Walko

customer_reviews.title: Minimal assembly , but used longer screws .
customer_reviews.text: No problems, and husband is happy with this wall mount desk . The Assembly was minimal . However we did use longer screws than the ones provided as they seemed short & inadequate .
customer_reviews.author: B. Oster

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect in my office for my employee and does not take up any space
customer_reviews.author: jr

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: super easy to install, i love it. I use it daily to study, I have my laptop and textbook on it and it has stayed sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Now it's perfect. The manufacturer should make a note of this
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's quite functional, however it has a major construction defect. The flip out platform is supported by four small screws,the result the platform collapsed under a weight of only 3 pounds. I repaired it by putting larger screws fixed by screw nuts.Now it's perfect .The manufacturer should make a note of this.
customer_reviews.author: Asif Mirza

customer_reviews.title: Good packaging - no damage
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected! Came completely undamaged, and is actually larger and thicker than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: DangerMouse___

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the idea of this
customer_reviews.text: I really would have liked to keep this but for the area that I was looking for it was a little too big. I love this idea though and would have kept it if I had the space. I have a small apartment and I was using it for my sons small room for a desk under the window. It came down just a little too far.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Looks nice. Takes some work to install. So far good quality. Mine came with a minor blemish and Amazon refunded %25.
customer_reviews.author: Shemuel

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Very good quality and usefulness especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Touchton

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my daycare entryway for the parents to sign in and out... Does not take up any room !
customer_reviews.author: Lora Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: The tray only lasted one day. We only set ...
customer_reviews.text: The tray only lasted one day. We only set an Apple Air on top of the desk tray and the screws broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and mount. May want to replace the fasteners to more heavy duty ones.
customer_reviews.author: Dannie

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Like the wall mount desk but missing parts. Unable to connect to customer service re: Willingham Wall Mount Desk.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Ward

customer_reviews.title: VERY IMPRESSED!
customer_reviews.text: READ THE OTHER REVIEWS ABOUT MOUNTING. DO NOT USE THE INCLUDED HARDWARE! Look, this thing is good quality but it's cheap. Be smart about what it is you're buying. This amount of weight will not hang on three sheet rock inserts. I mounted mine right to the studs by drilling two new holes. Look at the tiny screws holding the work surface, THEY WILL NOT SUPPORT YOUR BODY WEIGHT! Don't lean on it, just type or write on it. It looks and functions great. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wardian55Top Contributor: Archery

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far!
customer_reviews.text: I am provisionally giving 4.5 stars until my new desk is wall-mounted and in use. The delivery was apparently delayed and a very courteous person called from the retailer to alert me, but the desk still arrived in good time. It is an attractively finished piece and uses space very well. No assembly; just screw on the two knobs. As the shelf is not supported from below as in a floor-standing model, we will see how much stress the shelf brackets take. We may support the desk from below with right-angle bent brackets, for extra stability.
customer_reviews.author: COD shopper

customer_reviews.title: Desk that did take up to mush space
customer_reviews.text: I like it. But if you have a laptop that is 17 inch screen it won't fit
customer_reviews.author: Christina Tallerdy

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't as good as we hoped, but as long as you don't lean hard on the desk top it will be ok. But I don't think it would hold up to much punishment
customer_reviews.author: Melody Moore

customer_reviews.title: Terrific desk!
customer_reviews.text: The desk is beautiful, well-made, and arrived in excellent packaging. However, I did buy different mounting hardware for it, since what it came with wouldn't have worked very well. It only cost a couple dollars; and since the desk itself is so nice, I give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa B.

customer_reviews.title: Practically perfect in every way!
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely perfect! The exact size and look I wanted. Easy to install and set up too. Couldn’t be happier with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karolyn

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Broke within a week of installation. Not made of wood, core is pressed cardboard with Formica covering. Hinge screws pulled out of desk surface, nothing there strong enough to hold the screws in place. Looked like a nice product, too bad quality is so poor.
customer_reviews.author: FD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture I use it as a vanity ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of furniture I use it as a vanity for my makeup. Close it up when not in use its great for my small bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Webster

customer_reviews.title: wall desk
customer_reviews.text: It works out well. I really don't have room for a desk and this does the trick. I just wish it had a different shelf in tne middle. I do like it though.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Fitch

customer_reviews.title: Great desk!!
customer_reviews.text: My sons room is 12x12 and has a full captains bed, bookcase and 2 dressers. Not a lot of room left for a desk so this was the perfect solution!! He loves it!! He put this on his Christmas list, he's 10, after going through all the other brands and reviews he found this one to be the best. And he's right! It's perfect! Doesn't take up a lot of space, easy to mount in the wall and spacious in the inside for all his supplies. Just FYI- this is not a kids desk. It's for adults and would look beautiful anywhere in the house. My husband loved it as well and wants one for the bedroom!!
customer_reviews.author: EDUCATING MOM

customer_reviews.title: Well built and functional
customer_reviews.text: This little desk is perfect for the narrow area I need it in. Well built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and functions well.
customer_reviews.text: We love the look and how it’s and “undercover space“ all tucked away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my small room, beautiful finish
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the SEI Wall Mount Desk to save space in a small bedroom, it is perfect in every way. The wood is very nice and has a beautiful finish. This desk is just the right size and has spaces to put all the necessary desk items to keep everything organized. This is a well constructed desk that was very simple to mount on the wall. I am very pleased with this purchase, it is very sturdy. This wall mount desk is just as pictured, but it looks even better on my wall. It takes up so little room and provides an adequate work area. I'm glad I purchased this desk
customer_reviews.author: LH Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great compact desk. It has space for your bills, stamps and envelopes. places for nick-knacks. Very nice looking. I am very happy we got this
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely what I needed! Came put together already which was a huge bonus!
customer_reviews.author: pixie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this compact desk! Every easy to install. Has held up great with my kids using it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Benson

customer_reviews.title: Great 2nd desk
customer_reviews.text: Works great in our office. It gives us a second desk without taking up space
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Impressive! ❧
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the speed of delivery. The ease of install which includes a bubble level for accuracy. And the quality of the wall desk itself is a welcome addition.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda K Hauer-Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: extremely well made, goes well with clamp light. no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Chaordic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOve it!!! Perfect desk for the wall. It’s a great space saver
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dupoux

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wall mount laptop desk 2weeks ago It's already broken The screws holding bracket not strong enough
customer_reviews.author: lolah mused

customer_reviews.title: its perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my iphone and ipad. its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: mrosie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect size desk for the area under a stairwell that I made into a work space!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: a little smaller than I thought but it is perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: a little smaller than I thought but it is perfect for my needs. it takes 2 people to and a stud finder to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful however 1 month after it arrived the writing surface ...
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful however 1 month after it arrived the writing surface broke off the screws holding it to the shelves. For its price I would have expected it to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: alejandra cabrera

customer_reviews.title: very possitive
customer_reviews.text: nice little wall desk, no problems, and solved a problem for us.
customer_reviews.author: grandpa

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it so much And it was really easy to put up!

product_meta.title: SEI Furniture Willingham Wall Mount Folding Laptop Desk, Mahogany
product_meta.description: An ideal solution for any room, this brown mahogany, wall mount laptop desk folds away neat and compact. Fold the desk down and you reveal a convenient storage area with shelves, bill organizers and a corkboard. The desk is finished out with a useful drawer to store away pens, pencils, and anything else you may want to keep out of sight. Whether you choose to use this in your home office, living room, or dorm, you are sure to be pleased with the amazing functionality of this fold out desk. This small-space friendly wall mounted profile includes 4 compartments, 1 angled paper organizer, 1 corkboard, and 1 drawer total. Dimensions include: Overall: 26" W x 6" D x 20" HWriting surface: 24.75" W x 13.5" D; Large cubby: 16.5" W x 5.5" D x 13.75" H; Medium cubbies: 3.75" W x 5.25" D x 8.75" H; Small cubbies: 3.75" W x 5.25" D x 4.25" H; Drawer: 24" W x 5" D x 3.25" HThis one-of-a-kind item approximately weighs 29 poundsand can . Only quality materials and manufacturing will do. Product materials include: MDF, wood veneer, metal. Assembly: Required. Made in China.
feature_bullets: Wall mounted desk features four compartments, one angled paper organizer, one corkboard, one drawer, and a fold-down desktop
Small-space friendly Wall mounted profile works in the home office or living room space
Brown Mahogany Finish combines with a rectangular silhouette for effortless, Universal style
Storage desk is made with MDF with wood veneer and metal hardware
Furniture piece Weighs 25 pounds, supports 30 pounds when mounted to Wall stud, and measures 26 inches wide x 6 inches deep x 20 inches high Overall
